FuncDef: The display igmp snooping explicit-tracking command displays host tracking information of a VLAN. The display igmp snooping explicit-tracking command displays host tracking information of a VLAN.
CLIs: display igmp snooping explicit-tracking { vlan [ <vlan-id> [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } ] ] } [ [ source-address <source-address> ] group-address <group-address> ] [ [ host-address <host-address> ] verbose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VLAN ID.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Specifies an interface type and number.
-

Specifies a multicast source address.
The value can be a Class A, B, or C address, in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a multicast group address.
The value ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a host address.
The value can be a Class A, B, or C address, in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display igmp snooping explicit-tracking vlan verbose
